text: 🚨Neuigkeiten von UAMS!🚨Congrats to the 9 physicians named Healthcare Research All-Stars for 2024! 💫Their dedication to innovative research & best clinical practices is a shining example of progress in healthcare! 🌟Also, kudos to UAMS Hip and Knee surgery for being ranked top 1% nationwide! 🔥👏Let's keep pushing the boundaries of medical research & ensuring accessible healthcare for all! 💪🌎
